availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Murphy Kitchen (Carter County, Kentucky, farm hand)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farm hand. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Kitchen. Father of Maranda F. Kitchen, Harriet A. Kitchen, John Kitchen, Alexander Kitchen, George W. Kichen, Lewis Kitchen, and Mary E. Kitchen. Farm hand in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 143.
Find A Grave, "Murphy Kitchen (January 9, 1823-August 19, 1880)," Memorial #93105927, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/93105927 (accessed May 7, 2018).
